about_the_game:
Hunters, rejoice! The original music of Monster Hunter 3 (Tri) makes its way to Steam! Monster Hunter 3 (Tri) Original Soundtrack includes the theme "To One with Life" and an arranged version of the classic Monster Hunter anthem "Proof of a Hero".

The 146+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
